name: Smart Home Automation System
desc: IoT-based smart home system using ESP32, sensors, and mobile app control. Integrates Firebase for real-time device monitoring.

name: Rover Control Platform
desc: Custom-built control interface for the WISE Rover project. Designed 3D structures, mechanical joints, and embedded communication.

name: Industrial Robotic Arm
desc: Low-cost 6-DOF robotic arm with precision motor control using Arduino Mega and custom PID algorithms for automation tasks.

name: Weather Monitoring Station
desc: ESP32-based IoT weather station collecting temperature, humidity, and air pressure data with Firebase integration.

name: 3D Printer Automation
desc: Automated print queue management system for industrial 3D printers with Klipper integration and performance analytics.

name: IoT Greenhouse Monitor
desc: Smart agriculture project controlling irrigation and environment with NodeMCU, sensors, and remote dashboard interface.

name: Rescue Robot Vehicle
desc: Autonomous robotic vehicle using ultrasonic sensors, GPS, and real-time obstacle avoidance for disaster assistance.

name: IoT Device Dashboard
desc: Full-stack web dashboard to visualise IoT data using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and WebSocket for real-time updates.

name: Robotics Simulation Toolkit
desc: 3D robotics simulator using Fusion 360 and Python scripts for motion testing, collision detection, and path analysis.

name: IoT Cloud Platform
desc: Developed a cloud-based IoT interface using Firebase and MQTT for device registration and live sensor control.

name: Raspberry Pi Home Server
desc: Compact server running on Raspberry Pi for file management, network monitoring, and IoT device communication.

name: 3D Print Farm Manager
desc: Web application to control multiple printers remotely. Implemented using Flask, REST API, and real-time status logs.

name: AI Vision Bot
desc: Jetson Nano-powered vision robot with OpenCV for face tracking and object detection. Supports autonomous navigation.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal portfolio website showcasing IoT, robotics, and automation projects with responsive design and animations.

name: Smart Energy Meter
desc: IoT-based energy tracking device using ESP8266 and Firebase to monitor real-time voltage and current data.

name: Robotics Learning Platform
desc: Interactive learning module for students to learn embedded systems and robotics programming through simulations.

name: Automated Banking Robot
desc: Prototype robot that simulates secure deposit and withdrawal automation using servo-based mechanisms.

name: IoT Security Framework
desc: Research prototype enhancing IoT network security using AES encryption between microcontrollers and cloud nodes.

name: 3D Modelling Template Kit
desc: Fusion 360 template set for rapid prototyping of robotics components and 3D design automation.

name: Food Automation Robot
desc: Programmable robotic arm for kitchen automation, integrating sensors for food handling precision.

name: Smart Kiosk Interface
desc: Touch-based kiosk system using Raspberry Pi and Python for automated ticketing and customer interaction.

name: IoT Chat Node
desc: Lightweight IoT message relay using MQTT broker and ESP modules for multi-device communication.

name: Bluetooth Controlled Bot
desc: Android-controlled robot vehicle built using Arduino UNO and Bluetooth module for wireless operation.

name: Sensor Data Logger
desc: Offline sensor logging device using SD card integration and real-time data acquisition for analysis.

name: 3D Print Submission Portal
desc: Online platform for submitting and managing 3D printing projects with file preview and cost calculator.

name: Robotics Project Hub
desc: Central platform showcasing various robotics projects, complete with circuit diagrams and documentation.

name: Job Tracker IoT Edition
desc: IoT-integrated workflow dashboard tracking automation system performance with sensor-based alerts.

name: Legacy Robotics Projects
desc: Collection of early robotics prototypes and embedded systems experiments during initial research phase.

name: Resistor Color Code Tool
desc: Web-based tool to calculate resistor values from colour bands. Includes tolerance and power rating calculator.

name: Smart Vehicle Info System
desc: Dashboard display and diagnostics system for electric vehicles using ESP32 and CAN bus communication.

name: Smart Food Ordering Bot
desc: Autonomous food delivery bot using ultrasonic sensors and motor driver control programmed with Arduino.

name: Masjid Information Map
desc: Interactive web map displaying Bangladeshâ€™s mosques with links to Wikipedia for historical details.
